data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, 1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne.
Sven Jablonski awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, In Cologne Wolfsburg drive forward through Josip Brekalo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg's Renato Steffen gets in a shot on goal at RheinEnergieStadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 7, Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Wolfsburg.
Elvis Rexhbecaj for 1. FC Cologne drives towards goal at RheinEnergieStadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, In Cologne 1. FC Cologne's Ondrej Duda is caught offside.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
In the minute 11, Sven Jablonski signals a 1. FC Cologne throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Wout Weghorst gets his shot on target but fails to score for Wolfsburg.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
In the minute 14, 1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
In the minute 16, Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
1. FC Cologne push forward at RheinEnergieStadion and Ismail Jakobs gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Wolfsburg defence.
Goal! 1. FC Cologne have got their heads in front thanks to a Jan Thielmann strike.
In the minute 18, Great play from Salih Ozcan to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Maximilian Philipp gets his shot on target but fails to score for Wolfsburg.
In the minute 22, Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
1. FC Cologne are pushing forward but Salih Ozcan's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 23, Sven Jablonski awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Wolfsburg at RheinEnergieStadion.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
Free kick Wolfsburg.
In the minute 29, Goal! Maximilian Arnold equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
1. FC Cologne to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
In the minute 32, Sven Jablonski signals a 1. FC Cologne throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 33, Sven Jablonski awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 36, Wolfsburg's Xaver Schlager misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
In the minute 38, Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
Salih Ozcan is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Markus Gisdol (1. FC Cologne) is making a first change, with Dominick Drexler replacing the possibly injured Salih Ozcan.
In the minute 41, Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
Ondrej Duda is on target to give 1. FC Cologne a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 43, That's a fine assist from Elvis Rexhbecaj.
At RheinEnergieStadion the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 45, Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over at RheinEnergieStadion.
The second-half is underway in Cologne.
In the minute 47, Wout Weghorst (Wolfsburg) nets with a header to make it 2-2 at RheinEnergieStadion.
Renato Steffen instrumental with a fine assist.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Timo Horn.
In the minute 50, 1. FC Cologne's Timo Horn is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 51, Wolfsburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Wolfsburg are coming forward and Renato Steffen gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
In the minute 58, Xaver Schlager (Wolfsburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Jerome Roussillon of Wolfsburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Sven Jablonski awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Wolfsburg.
Sven Jablonski signals a 1. FC Cologne throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Free kick Wolfsburg.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
In the minute 62, Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Xaver Schlager of Wolfsburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, 1. FC Cologne to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
At RheinEnergieStadion, Wolfsburg are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 67, Can 1. FC Cologne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolfsburg's half?
Sven Jablonski blows against 1. FC Cologne's Dominick Drexler for offside.
Daniel Ginczek is replacing Maximilian Philipp for Wolfsburg at RheinEnergieStadion.
In the minute 69, Wolfsburg's Renato Steffen breaks free at RheinEnergieStadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Wolfsburg's Ridle Baku gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
In the minute 76, Oliver Glasner is making the team's second substitution at RheinEnergieStadion with Paulo Otavio replacing Jerome Roussillon.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
1. FC Cologne to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
In the minute 79, Sven Jablonski signals a throw-in for 1. FC Cologne, close to Wolfsburg's area.
Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 82, Wolfsburg's Maxence Lacroix misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for 1. FC Cologne in Cologne.
In the minute 84, Sven Jablonski signals a 1. FC Cologne throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Sven Jablonski signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Attention is being given to 1. FC Cologneâ€™s Marius Wolf and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 88, 1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sebastian Andersson is replacing Elvis Rexhbecaj for the home team.
Marius Wolf (1. FC Cologne) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Benno Erik Schmitz.
Free kick Wolfsburg.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Xaver Schlager for Wolfsburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sven Jablonski awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
Sven Jablonski blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
The away team have replaced Renato Steffen with Omar Marmoush. This is the third substitution made today by Oliver Glasner.
Paulo Otavio (Wolfsburg) has received a first yellow card.
